author: rudolf6
content:
agenda for this upcoming Monday's Verkle Implementers Call
https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1064

and just wanted to flag one of the agenda topics: "preimage distribution" 

can read a great in-depth writeup on this topic from <@774033563732541451> which contains more background info here: 
https://hackmd.io/@jsign/vkt-preimage-generation-and-distribution

and a more recent idea for a (partial) solution to the problem from <@436244295544995840> here: 
https://notes.ethereum.org/QUOsJN2mTQOqEtUQMsBUlw
